subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets scored four early runs off the Dodgers’ ace Brad Penny, but starter Jorge Sosa allowed six, including five in a tedious fourth inning, as the Mets fell on Saturday.
snippet: The Mets scored four early runs off the Dodgers’ ace Brad Penny, but starter Jorge Sosa allowed six, including five in a tedious fourth inning, as the Mets fell on Saturday.
